educationAndCareer.title: Education & Career
educationAndCareer.text1: After completing my vocational diploma with a focus on electrical engineering, I studied business informatics.
educationAndCareer.text2: My professional career began with the functional support of software for designing target architectures. Later, I worked as a developer and consultant, focussing on the development of applications for managing key figures and reports for large enterprises. During this time, I gained extensive experience, particularly with technologies such as TypeScript, Angular and NestJS. Additionally, I am a certified safety officer.
educationAndCareer.text3: I have a strong interest in developing innovative und sustainable software solutions that strategically support businesses and create lasting value.
